db:abstract.db:para: The QHelpContentModel class provides a model that supplies content to views.
This class was introduced in Qt 4.4.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual] int QHelpContentModel::columnCount(const QModelIndex &parent = QModelIndex()) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of columns under the given parent. Currently returns always 1.

db:section.db:title: QHelpContentItem *QHelpContentModel::contentItemAt(const QModelIndex &index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the help content item at the model index position index.

db:section.db:title: void QHelpContentModel::contentsCreated()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the contents have been created.

db:section.db:title: void QHelpContentModel::contentsCreationStarted()
db:section.db:para: This signal is emitted when the creation of the contents has started. The current contents are invalid from this point on until the signal contentsCreated() is emitted.

db:section.db:title: void QHelpContentModel::createContents(const QString &customFilterName)
db:section.db:para: Creates new contents by querying the help system for contents specified for the customFilterName.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual] QVariant QHelpContentModel::data(const QModelIndex &index, int role) const
db:section.db:para: Reimplements: QAbstractItemModel::data(const QModelIndex &index, int role) const.
Returns the data stored under the given role for the item referred to by the index.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual] QModelIndex QHelpContentModel::index(int row, int column, const QModelIndex &parent = QModelIndex()) const
db:section.db:para: Reimplements: QAbstractItemModel::index(int row, int column, const QModelIndex &parent) const.
Returns the index of the item in the model specified by the given row, column and parent index.

db:section.db:title: bool QHelpContentModel::isCreatingContents() const
db:section.db:para: Returns true if the contents are currently rebuilt, otherwise false.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual] QModelIndex QHelpContentModel::parent(const QModelIndex &index) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the parent of the model item with the given index, or QModelIndex() if it has no parent.

db:section.db:title: [override virtual] int QHelpContentModel::rowCount(const QModelIndex &parent = QModelIndex()) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the number of rows under the given parent.
